tool.name: BLAST filter FASTA file
tool.description: Divide a FASTA file based on BLAST hits
tool.help:
**What it does**
Typical use would be to take a multi-sequence FASTA and the tabular output of running BLAST on it, and divides the FASTA file in two: those sequence with a BLAST hit, and those without.
In the default NCBI BLAST+ tabular output, the query sequence ID is in column one, and the ID of the match from the database is in column two.
